AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: unknown
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was an Archopawn of unknown origins.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: unknown
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a Persona Archopawn created during the Archotech Renaissance .

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: manufacturer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was an Archopawn that worked for a glitterworld company to manufacture rare materials.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: architect
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was an Archopawn that constructed buildings during the Archotech Renaissance.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Archotech Doctor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was an Archopawn that performed medical acts with precision in a glitterworld.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: soldier
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was an Archopawn that was recruited during a war after the Archotech Renaissance.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: insane archopawn
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a True Archopawn that went through many trials. He went insane in a ship failure and went on a violent rampage.
